location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government of Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting a dispatch sent to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay, from C Russell, Acting Resident at Hyderabad dated 22 October, which includes a copy a letter sent on the same date from Russell to John Adam, Secretary to Government, on the subject of the visit of the two Persian agents Mirza Sadick [Mirza Sadiq] and Syed Ally [Said Ali] to the Court of Hyderabad, and their request for hospitality and protection from creditors.
